name: Dismantled 2 (DEMO)
description:
Return in the depth of the nightmare...
Uncover the true fate of June at the end of Bittersweet Misery.
This demo takes place between both games and will introduce you to a part of the setting where Dismantled 2 will take place. New enemies, new characters, new secrets...



This game contains frequent graphic, gory, and violent scenes.
Nudity and shocking themes such as necrophilia and abuse.
The material contained herein will definitely offend most players.
Proceed at your own risk.
Not suitable for anyone under the age of 18.
